description: Returns the current status of an existing association or disassociation request. A ResourceNotFoundException is thrown when no recent association or disassociation request with the specified token is found, or when the server does not exist. A ValidationException is raised when parameters of the request are not valid.

parameters.name: NodeAssociationStatusToken
parameters.description: The token returned in either the AssociateNodeResponse or the DisassociateNodeResponse.

parameters.name: ServerName
parameters.description: The name of the server from which to disassociate the node.

nested_items.name: NodeAssociationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the association or disassociation request.
SUCCESS: The association or disassociation succeeded.
FAILED: The association or disassociation failed.
IN_PROGRESS: The association or disassociation is still in progress.

nested_items.name: EngineAttributes
nested_items.description: Attributes specific to the node association. In Puppet, the attribute PUPPET_NODE_CERT contains the signed certificate (the result of the CSR).

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the engine attribute.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the engine attribute.
